Add Skins package support. ([4d49774](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/4d49774)) - Add support for "st-file-icons" package. ([e493311](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/e493311)) - Add support to st-file icons and update icons. Please check the readme file. ([8224e68](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/8224e68)) - Brand new theme variant: Palenight ([113b313](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/113b313)) - New ‚Äúmaterial_theme_arrow_folders‚Äù setting ([4c22ee0](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/4c22ee0)), closes [#998](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/issues/998) - New ‚Äúmaterial_theme_bullet_tree_indicator‚Äù setting ([cf0f513](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/cf0f513)) - Now the minimap viewport use the current accent color ([0aa5b69](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/0aa5b69)) ### BREAKING CHANGES - From this release Material Theme use the `st-file-icons` package to display file type icons. Please install it and restart Sublime Text.

name: v3.0.0
body:
üéâ NEW MAJOR RELEASE WITH NEW COLOR SCHEMES

üì£ Please open a new issue only for a bugfix.
üì£ If you don't like the new schemes use the old ones (now out of support).

  Main improvements:
  ‚ûº A completely new and improved color schemes
  ‚ûº A new theme builder that support variables and modules. The UI themes are now dynamic with variables.
  ‚ûº A new scheme builder that support variables and allows an easy customization/fix
  ‚ûº Oceanic schemes will not be provided anymore. If you want to use it, just download and customize the package.
  ‚ûº The previous color schemes are the new "old" ones
  ‚ûº Material Theme now support @3x retina display
  ‚ûº New schemes color palettes (Check the readme file)

name: v2.1.4
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº Fix a lot of UI color glitches
  ‚ûº Fix all accents colors mistakes (I hope)
  ‚ûº Fix "Unable to decode overlay_bar_horizontal.png" console error (removed asset declaration)

üèÆ COLOR SCHEMES

  ‚ûº Add color to html attributes in jsx scope
  ‚ûº Edit color for `this` variable in jsx and js files.

name: v2.1.3
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº New .pug file icon (Jade will be renamed Pug, more info here https://github.com/pugjs/pug/issues/2184)
  ‚ûº Fix some filetype icons.

üèÆ COLOR SCHEMES

  ‚ûº Fix italic comments for the dark scheme
  ‚ûº Fix/add italic html tag attributes
  ‚ûº Remove italic style from css classnames

üèÆ UI THEME

üèÆ COLOR SCHEM
  ‚ûº Update Oceanic Next color schemes

  ‚ûº Add italic stule to the html attributes

üèÆ COLOR SCHEME

name: v2.1.0
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº New setting to set a small search panel ("material_theme_compact_panel": true)
  ‚ûº New find/replace regex icon
  ‚ûº New npm file icon
  ‚ûº 3 KABOOM! Completely new accent color. Pink, Blue, Cyan

üèÆ COLOR SCHEME

  ‚ûº Fix active guide color with Lighter theme.
  ‚ûº Fix #id selector color for css/sass/scss

### UI THEME

  ‚ûº Removed file extension preferences
  ‚ûº Fix autocomplete selected row color (low contrast from text)

### COLOR SCHEMES

  ‚ûº Fix JSON color highlight up to 30 levels deep (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ‚ûº Add support for ESLint and Babel config file types (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ‚ûº Fix Gruntfile keyboard block comment shortcut (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ‚ûº Fix HTML tags color inside php files.
  ‚ûº Fix Lighter theme contrast issue (#676)

name: v2.0.7
body:
üèÆ COLOR SCHEMES

  ‚ûº Update all Oceanic Next color Schemes from original repositories.
  ‚ûº Fix some JS and Python color highlight issues
  ‚ûº Fix html attributes highlight when have parent have childrends

name: v2.0.6
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº Add support to the new status bar switch panel button (bottom left) from dev biuld 3101
  ‚ûº Fix tree highlight indicator to match current accent color

üèÆ COLOR SCHEME

  ‚ûº Fix ruby symbols color highlight
  ‚ûº Fix html attributes color clitch in some cases

name: v2.0.5
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

‚ûº Fix tabs and sidebar heading height when use both small tabs and disabled tabs scrolling

name: v2.0.4
body:
üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº Fix accent color for automplete popup and progress bar dialog (update popup)
  ‚ûº Fix commet toggle for gulpfiles (thanks to @opjlmi)
  ‚ûº Darker tab separator is now inverted and more visible
  ‚ûº Revisited yellow accent to match yellow appbar

üèÆ COLOR SCHEME

  ‚ûº Add support.stype color highlight

name: v2.0.1
body:
üëâ Version 2.0.1 üëà

---

üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº Minor fix to contrast mode setting to make consistency with new addon [Material Theme - App bar](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme-appbar)
  ‚ûº New indigo accent color ( **material_theme_accent_indigo": true** )

name: v2.0.0
body:
Material Theme for Sublime Text 3
https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme

üéâüéâüéâüéâüéâ
Happy 5K stars and 90K installations!! I love you all! ( except those who open issues without first reading the readme file )
üéâüéâüéâüéâüéâ

üëâ Version 2.0.0 üëà

---

üèÆ UI THEME

  ‚ûº Increase sidebar spacing and add new setting to enable old compact sidebar ( "material_theme_compact_sidebar": true )
  ‚ûº Update some filetype icons
  ‚ûº Fixed blade icon not showing after the latest updates
  ‚ûº Revisited tabs size and centering

üèÆ COLOR SCHEME

  ‚ûº Oldest color scheme will now be available under OLD folder ( Packages/Material Theme/schemes/OLD/Material-Theme-*.tmTheme )
  ‚ûº Sass & SCSS lang files removed to avoid issues with the main packages.

üèÆ CORE

  ‚ûº Add a gulp/js compiler to the main theme structure. Now to edit this theme we have to clone develop branch and edit source (./src) files, install dependencies by run `$ npm install` and then compile by run `$ gulp`

name: v0.9.0
body:
## UI improvements and refinition
- Fixed scrollbar stretching pattern
- New darker theme version, use `"theme": "Material-Theme-Darker.sublime-theme"` to activate it
- Fixed darker version assets
- New assets structure
- New widgets structure
- Better scalable theme structure

## Syntax Color (testing)
- New line highlight color
- Markdown colors fixed and updates

name: v0.7.0
body:
## UI improvements and refinition
- Fix folder icons in the tree view
- Fix quick panel (projects manager) and mini quick panel style
- Fix scrollbars (standard and overlay) (i suggest to use `"overlay_scroll_bars": "enabled",` setting for a better experience)
- Removed unused assets

## Syntax Color (testing)
- Syntax color highlight implementation (based on Oceanic https://github.com/voronianski/oceanic-next-theme)
- Fix color for indent guidelines and gutter line numbers
- Changed color for selection and linehighlight

name: v0.5.0
body:
## UI imporvements and refinition
- Added scrollbars style (i suggest to use `"overlay_scroll_bars": "enabled",` setting for a better experience)
- Added tooltips style ‚ÄîReference: http://www.google.com/design/spec/components/tooltips.html#tooltips-usage)
- Add some missing icons
- Fix highlight match icon in find/replace panel
- Removed unused assets
- Fix code fold icon
- Fix input padding and margin (find/replace)‚ÄîReference: http://www.google.com/design/spec/components/text-fields.html#text-fields-single-line-text-field)
- Added style for popup windows (update check and download)
- Removed Roboto font dependecies from UI (now you will see the original font)
